title: Track fault affecting Circle Line services

updates.text: [CCL] CLEARED: Train services between #DhobyGhaut /#MarinaBay and #Stadium have resumed. Free regular bus and bridging bus services have ended.

[CCL] UPDATE: Train services are progressively being restored. Free regular bus services are still available between #DhobyGhaut/ #MarinaBay and #PayaLebar. Bridging bus services are available between #Promenade and #PayaLebar.
[CCL] UPDATE: If your journey has been impacted, you can obtain an e-Travel Chit to serve as proof of your travel by visiting https://t.co/dYFVNdxSLs.
[CCL] UPDATE: If your travel has been affected, you can obtain an e-Travel Chit as evidence of your journey by visiting https://t.co/dYFVNdxSLs.
[CCL] UPDATE: You may download an e-Travel Chit as proof of your travel at https://t.co/Rcx8ksSrKK if your journey has been affected.
[CCL] UPDATE: If your travel has been affected, you have the option to acquire an e-Travel Chit as proof of your travel at https://t.co/dYFVNdxSLs.
[CCL] UPDATE: If your journey has been impacted, you have the option to acquire an e-Travel Chit as proof of your travel at https://t.co/dYFVNdxSLs.
[CCL] UPDATE: If your journey has been impacted, please download an e-Travel Chit as proof of your travel at https://t.co/dYFVNdxSLs.
[CCL] UPDATE: Download an e-Travel Chit as proof of your travel at https://t.co/dYFVNdxSLs if your journey has been affected.
[CCL] UPDATE: You may download an e-Travel Chit as proof of your travel at https://t.co/dYFVNdxSLs if your journey has been affected.

[CCL] UPDATE: Our engineers are working to recover train services. For your convenience, you may download an e-Travel Chit as proof of your travel at https://t.co/dYFVNdxSLs if your journey has been affected.
[CCL] UPDATE: Our engineers are still rectifying the fault. Please add 30 mins train travel time between #DhobyGhaut / #MarinaBay and #Stadium.
[CCL] UPDATE: Our engineers are still rectifying the fault. Please add 30 minutes travelling time between #DhobyGhaut / #MarinaBay and #Stadium.
[CCL] UPDATE: Our engineers are still rectifying the fault. Please add 30 minutes train travel time between #DhobyGhaut / #MarinaBay and #Stadium.

[CCL]: Due to a track fault, train services between #DhobyGhaut / #MarinaBayand #Stadium are affected. Train shuttle services are available between #DhobyGhaut/ #MarinaBayand #Stadium. Please add 30 minutes additional travel time between #DhobyGhaut/ #MarinaBay and #Stadium.
